revised_title: Bondi's Vector and Seliger & Whitham's Variational Principle in Matter Fields
tldr: The authors extend Bondi's Newtonian Pointing Vector to other "Bondi-type" conserved quantities using the Seliger & Whitham variational method. They show that these expressions naturally arise in contexts concerned with equations of motion. The authors also derive a pseudo-tensor for General Relativity, which tends to Bondi's vector in the Newtonian limit.
